p: Three species of mosquitoes were used for experiments. The Anopheles gambiae colony was kindly provided by Janet Teeple (The Pennsylvania State University, University Park, PA, USA) and was originally obtained from The National Institutes of Health (Bethesda, MD). Anopheles stephensi (Liston strain) were provided by Johns Hopkins University (Baltimore, MD, USA). The Cx. quinquefasciatus colony was provided by the Wadsworth Center (Slingerlands, NY, USA) and was initially derived from a colony maintained by Benzon Research (Carlisle, PA, USA).
